what_are_cookies.title: 1. What are cookies?
text: Cookies are small text files that are stored on your device when you visit our site. They help improve site performance and provide personalized content.

types_of_cookies.title: 2. What cookies do we use?
types_of_cookies.text: We use the following types of cookies:
list: Necessary cookies — help the site function properly.
Analytical cookies — collect visit statistics (Google Analytics).
Marketing cookies — used for personalized advertising.

disable_cookies.title: 3. How to disable cookies?
text: You can disable cookies in your browser settings. However, this may affect the correct functioning of the site.

data_access.title: 4. Who has access to the data?
text: We do not share data with third parties, except for analytics services (Google, Facebook).
